title: The Singing Squirrel
hook: Can a tiny squirrel save the forest with her voice? Join Nutmeg on her melodious adventure!
moral: Kindness and courage can overcome any obstacle.
paragraphs: In the heart of the Enchanted Forest lived a tiny squirrel named Nutmeg. She had a special gift - a voice that could make flowers bloom and birds dance.
One day, a wicked witch cursed the forest, silencing all its inhabitants. Trees wilted, and animals lost their joy. Nutmeg knew she had to do something.
Determined to lift the curse, Nutmeg embarked on a musical journey. She sang to the wilted flowers, whispered melodies to the sad animals, and filled the air with her enchanting tunes.
Despite facing obstacles like roaring thunderstorms and growling bears, Nutmeg's kindness and bravery shone bright. With every note she sang, the curse weakened until it finally broke.
The forest burst back to life, vibrant and cheerful as ever. The animals gathered around Nutmeg, thanking her for bringing back the music of nature.

en-fr.title: L'Ecureuil Chanteur
en-fr.moral: La gentillesse et le courage peuvent surmonter n'importe quel obstacle.
en-fr.hook: Est-ce qu'un petit écureuil peut sauver la forêt avec sa voix ? Rejoins Noisette dans son aventure mélodieuse !
paragraphs:
Au coeur de la Forêt Enchantée vivait un petit écureuil nommé Nutmeg. Elle avait un don spécial - une voix qui pouvait faire fleurir les fleurs et danser les oiseaux.
Il était une fois, une vilaine sorcière a jeté un sort à la forêt, faisant taire tous ses habitants. Les arbres se flétrirent et les animaux perdirent leur joie. Nutmeg savait qu'elle devait agir.
Nutmeg décida de lever le sortilège et se lança dans un voyage musical. Elle chanta aux fleurs fanées, chuchota des mélodies aux animaux tristes, et remplit l'air de ses chansons enchanteresses.
Malgré les obstacles comme les orages et les ours qui grognent, la gentillesse et le courage de Nutmeg brillaient de plus en plus. À chaque note qu'elle chantait, la malédiction s'affaiblissait jusqu'à ce qu'elle finisse par se briser.
La forêt a explosé de vie, joyeuse et brillante comme toujours. Les animaux se sont rassemblés autour de Nutmeg, la remerciant d'avoir ramené la musique de la nature.

en-pt.title: O Esquilo Cantor
en-pt.moral: Bondade e coragem podem vencer qualquer desafio.
en-pt.hook: Será que uma esquilo pequenininha pode salvar a floresta com a sua voz? Acompanhe Noz-Moscada na sua aventura melódica!
paragraphs:
No coração da Floresta Encantada vivia uma esquilinha chamada Noz-moscada. Ela tinha um dom especial - uma voz que fazia as flores florescerem e os pássaros dançarem.
Certa vez, uma bruxa má amaldiçoou a floresta, deixando todos os seus moradores em silêncio. As árvores murcharam e os animais perderam sua alegria. Noz-Moscada sabia que precisava fazer alguma coisa.
Decidida a quebrar o feitiço, Noz-Moscada embarcou em uma viagem musical. Ela cantou para as flores murchas, sussurrou melodias para os animais tristes, e encheu o ar com suas músicas encantadoras.
Mesmo enfrentando obstáculos como tempestades estrondosas e ursos rosnantes, a bondade e coragem de Nutmeg brilharam intensamente. Com cada nota que ela cantava, a maldição enfraquecia até que finalmente quebrou.
A floresta voltou a vida, colorida e alegre como sempre. Os animais se reuniram ao redor de Noz-moscada, agradecendo-a por trazer de volta a música da natureza.

id-en.hook: Can a tiny squirrel save the forest with her voice? Join Nutmeg on her melodious adventure!
id-en.moral: Kindness and courage can overcome any obstacle.
id-en.title: The Singing Squirrel
paragraphs:
In the middle of the Magical Woods, there was a small squirrel called Nutmeg. She had a special talent - a voice that could make flowers blossom and birds move with joy.
Once upon a time, a bad witch put a spell on the forest, making everyone quiet. The trees looked sad, and the animals were not happy. Nutmeg understood she needed to help.
Nutmeg wanted to break a spell, so she went on a music adventure. She sang to droopy flowers, hummed to gloomy animals, and made the air magical with her songs.
A little squirrel named Nutmeg was very kind and brave. Even when there were loud storms and scary bears, Nutmeg stayed strong. Her singing was so magical that it helped break a curse.
The big forest woke up again, colorful and happy like always. The cute animals came close to Nutmeg, saying 'thank you' for bringing back nature's music.

en-de.title: Der Singende Eichhörnchen
en-de.moral: Freundlichkeit und Mut können jedes Hindernis überwinden.
en-de.hook: Kann ein winziges Eichhörnchen den Wald mit seiner Stimme retten? Begleite Zimt auf ihr melodisches Abenteuer!
paragraphs:
In dem Zauberwald wohnte ein winziges Eichhörnchen namens Muskat. Sie hatte ein besonderes Talent - eine Stimme, die Blumen erblühen lassen und Vögel tanzen machen konnte.
Eines Tages verfluchte eine böse Hexe den Wald, indem sie alle Bewohner verstummen ließ. Die Bäume verwelkten und die Tiere verloren ihre Freude. Muskatnuss wusste, dass sie etwas tun musste.
Fest entschlossen, den Fluch zu brechen, begab sich Muskatnuss auf eine musikalische Reise. Sie sang zu den verwelkten Blumen, flüsterte Melodien zu den traurigen Tieren und erfüllte die Luft mit ihren bezaubernden Klängen.
Trotz der Hindernisse wie donnender Gewitter und knurrender Bären strahlte Nusskinds Freundlichkeit und Tapferkeit hell. Mit jedem Ton, den sie sang, schwächte sich der Fluch ab, bis er schließlich brach.
Der Wald erwachte wieder zum Leben, lebhaft und fröhlich wie eh und je. Die Tiere versammelten sich um Muskatnuss und dankten ihr, dass sie die Musik der Natur zurückgebracht hatte.
